column2: Americanist Patron
Now that I am of age, it is time for me to choose the President I wish to emulate.
I choose Washington, the greatest of all the Presidents
I choose Jefferson, Expander of America and Protector of Funds
I choose Lincoln, Equalizer and Breaker of Chains and Traitors
I choose Roosevelt, Strength Incarnate
You choose Washington, the Chief
You choose Jefferson, the Trademaster
You choose Lincoln, the Uniter
You choose Roosevelt, the Strong
I have chosen Washington as my patron
May my sword by swift!
I have chosen Jefferson as my patron
May my actions be of a true patriot!
I have chosen Lincoln as my patron
May my tongue sway hearts and minds!
I have chosen Hamilton as my patron
May my coffers be filled!
Washingtonian
This character has chosen Washington, the Chief, as their patron
Jeffersonian
This character has chosen Jefferson, the Trademaster, as their patron
Lincolnian
This character has chosen Lincoln, the Uniter, as their patron
Rooseveltian
This character has chosen Roosevelt, the Strong, as their patron
Now that you are President, you may choose to reverse some of the decisions made by your late predecessor.
The last president may have gotten some things wrong...
You decide to make an executive order, reversing all excommunications of the previous administration.
A president's word is infallible!
You decide to keep all excommunications made by the last president.
The president has justed ordered that all previously excommunicated Americanists be allowed to return to the courts, granted that they are true to the faith.
May Washington bless the president!
The President has chosen not to remove your unjust excommunicated his predecessor laid upon you.
Disappointing...
Immoral Patriot
Immoral President
Hereditary Presidency
